page.title: 12Shops in the Area
page.content:
There are only a few shops in our area.
Smisby:post office which sells a few stationery items. Hartshorne:Post office which is also a small general store Newsagents. Blackfordby:Post office General stores.
Most people have their milk and newspapers delivered to their houses. If people want any prescriptions or medical things they have to travel at least 3 miles.
The small general stores in our area sell most grocery greengrocery and bakery goods.They are usually more expensive to buy than if people (next page)
